summary: A Metropolitan Correctional Center memorandum from August 12, 2019, reporting information passed from the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein needing a cellmate upon return from an attorney visit and another inmate possibly not returning.

persons.name: Grijalva
persons.role: S/O/S (likely Special Operations Supervisor or similar correctional staff)
persons.context: Correctional officer who passed on information from the Special Housing Unit regarding inmate movements.

persons.name: Reyes
persons.context: Inmate #85993-054 who was reportedly going WAD (likely 'With Authorization of the Director' or similar transfer) and might not return.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054 (Jeffrey Epstein) who was noted as needing a cellmate upon his return from an attorney visit.

events.title: Information passed from Special Housing Unit
events.description: Correctional staff passed information that inmate Reyes was going WAD and might not return, and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The memorandum is dated August 12, 2019, and references events from August 9, 2019.
It notes that Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.
It also mentions inmate Reyes (#85993-054) was going WAD and might not return.
The document is a government memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
